1) Generate data, upload to S3, use it for EMRS; generate data, upload to Redshift. Use tpch-kit to generate data. This is the industry standard when benchmarking databases against fake data sets. SIDE NOTE: S3 multipart upload automatically happens for files larger than 100MB when utilizing aws s3 cp command and other high-level abstractions.
